website_summaries.verdict: A no-frills vacuum cleaner that will get the job done no matter what.
pros: Well-made vacuum built to tackle the toughest jobs
cons: No adjustment for carpet height and no hose or additional tools

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Changed my review to 1 star because the handle snapped in half. Machine worked very well before it broke, rendering it useless. It is supposed to be a commercial vacuum which means durable . This should have lasted much more than 6 months. Very disappointed in the quality of the workmanship. .
customer_reviews.author: murphtps

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews before I purchased this and they were very good. What I didn't realize is that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked at all of the reviews before I purchased this and they were very good. What I didn't realize is that it is a commercial product and can only be used on very low pile carpeting. It will hardly move on most of my carpets. It has no adjustment for carpet height.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J

customer_reviews.title: New ORECK...
customer_reviews.text: I love my new ORECK! The 40' extention cord is nice, I don't have to keep unplugging it while vacuming each room. This is my 2nd ORECK I have purchased, (gave 1st one to my son) love that it is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not quite commercial quality, but sufficient
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and great for light work, but hardly "commercial". The build, yes. However, commercial vacuums should have more suction than this has. This is a great vacuum for light work around your house, but won't pick up some larger objects. We have used Riccar vacuums for years, and couldn't find one in the time frame we needed to replace a broken one. Went with the Oreck, which works OK, but the Riccar outperforms it by leaps and bounds. Long cord is great. Price is great for what this vacuum is. I'd definitely go with this vacuum over a Bissel or a Wal Mart style vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Rich S.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective vacuum
customer_reviews.text: No frills, just a basic hardworking vacuum. No settings, no adjustments, no attachments, no light, no bag dock. Does have a pigtail cord that plugs into the power cord, so you can conceivably use an extension cord of any length. It had an extra handle on the back for carrying, and the whole vacuum is pretty lightweight. Even though it doesn't have a bag dock, I have been using Oreck type CC bags (from a vacuum with the bag dock) and haven't had any issues. Basic maintenance should be easy, and belts/rollers/bags are easy to find from a variety of sources.
customer_reviews.author: Oryx

customer_reviews.title: Does not do well on medium pile carpeting
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews of how great this machine is, however, not realizing that "Commercial" meant only flat or low pile carpeting, this vacuum doesn't do at all well with even medium pile carpeting. It is very hard to roll on the carpet and, it doesn't pick up well. I have runners (low pile) in my hallway and it works perfectly on those. I tried to return but, my return ended 4 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: MJOC

customer_reviews.title: THIEFS
customer_reviews.text: I have a janitorial company. I literally have purchased 11 vacuums from this seller just this year. This particular vacuum came in, not working, at all. So we mailed it to them to be fixed. 4 days later it came back, and it was shooting sparks from the motor when turned on. Mind you this vacuum has NOT BEEN USED AT ALL! So they said they would do a warranty on it and refund me, I would be happy with a new one. But, They will not return my emails now at all. I am stuck with a broken $200 vacuum that arrived broken. Shame on y'all.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum. Does the job. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, powerful suction, easy to use, long cord. Exactly what I wanted. A little on the loud side but I really love how well it does the job, especially on pet hair. Three small dogs and a cat, so plenty to clean up. I can go from rug to wood floor and it gets all the debris. Very happy with this vacuum. It is our third Oreck. Had two previously, then tried a Meile with attachments. Never hated a vacuum until that beast. Happy to be back to Oreck.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Far better value than the "prestige" brands.
customer_reviews.text: Far more useful than the expensive Miele we've had for years. Vacuums rugs more effectively. Doesn't need adjustment between different surfaces. Moves quickly through the house where the Miele was a pain to drag around and tended to spill parts as you did so. The only downside is this is louder. It's also far better than the Dyson upright we once had, in being lighter weight, at least as powerful, and having a bag, not to mention being less than half the price of the Dyson, and 1/4 the price of the Miele.
customer_reviews.author: whit

customer_reviews.title: awesome vacuum. Way better than our bagless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: awesome vacuum. Way better than our bagless vacuum. I no longer have to deal with all the dust when the vacuum is full. this vacuum is very nice and does a great job. The carpet was noticeably fluffier after vacuuming with this compared to our previous vacuum. Be aware that this has zero frills - no multi-speed switch, no light, no cord rewind, no attachments - nothing. it does one thing and one thing only, but it does it really well.
customer_reviews.author: Matteo Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Long cord, no way to store it on device
customer_reviews.text: Long cord is nice. No way to store it. It's a fairly basic device. If you don't have much carpet and most is on stairs, a nice choice. It's light. Suction? Gave it 3 stars. Hard to tell if you can't to side-by-side comparison. For this price range, I imagine it's quite good. No setting for bare floors or carpet height. Chose this because of weight, didn't want to spend $500 on a product that is mainly for stair use. It's not whisper quiet by any means.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this vacuum for the 2 months that it worked! Then, it stopped working. Won't turn on, nothing whatsoever. Buyer beware, Oreck's limited warranty does not cover this vacuum cleaner unless it is purchased from an Oreck authorized retail dealer. Tried calling the number on the ORECK users manual and reached BISSEL customer service..something fishy going on..will not purchase expensive appliance from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Cooter Mcstanky

customer_reviews.title: Bad burning smell!  Best to buy directly from Oreck for better quality!
customer_reviews.text: It produces burning smell right after I started using it! I researched online & some said smell would improve. I don’t use it very much, but it emits strong burning smell every time! I changed the belt & it still smells! It seems like it has a bad motor!?!! Only benefits: I do like the extra long cord! However, this is a bad product bought through Amazon! This is my 3rd oreck in 20 years. My 1st 2 Oreck uprights purchased directly through Oreck performed wonderful for more than 10 years each! I would like to return it!! STILL SMELLS BAD EVERY TIME!!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to use in my retail shop. Was used about 20 minutes a day, 3-4 days a week, for just over a year. It is now breaking in several places; the worst is the center 'cuff' that holds the top and bottom center shaft does not stay tight. The vacuum is useless without this piece as the unit practically folds in half without it. This 'commercial' vacuum is really just a simple model, not the durable commercial model I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: mandy johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum gets the job done. Vacuum entire home 7 days a week (have 3 dogs). Have owned other Orecks and a number of Dysons (great vacuums but too heavy). We are seniors and the wife is a clean freak. So, we have gone through a LOT of vacuum over the last fifty years. This particular Oreck is a one speed basic vacuum. No frills. I have converted it to use HEPA bags with a Bag Dock Support Brace Bracket ( This vacuum cannot be beat for functionality at its price point. I am very pleased with it, to say the least.... P.S. If it has any drawbacks it is that it is very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Denny D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vac
customer_reviews.text: The best vacuum for commercial low pile carpeting . I also use on Vinyl or tile floors . It moves from surface to surface with no effort.You can use for home also. It has a long cord, no more looking for plugs . It really is easy to use so lightweight. The most important is the ease of changing the vac bag . ..
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Something Has Definitely Changed
customer_reviews.text: I had an older, blue model of this exact vaccum and lost it in a flood. I figured this would be the same. Sorely disappointed. Is not made as well. The bag will not properly latch and dust ends up in the main bag, rendering the paper bag useless! I am calling them on Monday about this. Very irritating. I will not buy another if this is how quality has changed.
customer_reviews.author: LA MINERALS

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.  Lightweight.  Conquers stairs!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad my husband convinced me to buy this. I love that Oreck makes a solid product and doesn't add on extra gimmicks that are unnecessary like every other brand. Very lightweight and easy to maneuver. I was able to do my stairs so easily by keeping it upright and sliding it along each step--way faster than using an attachment. It also lays almost flat to get underneath furniture. I also like that it is made in the USA. Quieter than my dirt devil.
customer_reviews.author: alisa deering

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and easy to push.
customer_reviews.text: Downside of this product is that because the cord is so long, it feels like the cord weighs more than the machine and I often knock the vacuum over while trying to plug in the cord. Also, there are no attachments. Other than the weight of the cord which can be cumbersome, the vac works well. You cannot use this on small area rugs...only larger ones or wall-to-wall carpet.
customer_reviews.author: jude

customer_reviews.title: I’m so disappointed! The handle pulls right out of the rest ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed! The handle pulls right out of the rest of the vacuum. We contacted oreck but they won’t do anything about it even though it’s a known problem.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Simple, proven design that works ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, proven design that works. Light weight and powerful suction. Well designed and made with easy to replace brush rollers and belt. Nice touch with spare belt housed at the bottom of the unit. Excellent replaceable, heavy-duty (heavy in weight, could be a problem for some) extension cord design. Easy to replace bags for no mess clean up ... I really dislike bagless design as they are messy and have too damn many filters to clean or replace ... Long handle for excellent reach and ergonomic for taller person. Works well on both tall and short pile carpets. Built in the USA with globally (foreign) sourced parts ... if this really means anything for MADE IN THE USA advocates ...
customer_reviews.author: zanypoet

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in one month!!!! They will not replace!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 2: We shipped the vacuum to Oreck as they requested, last we ever heard from them. Never received a replacement or refund. UPDATE: Oreck stepped up and is going to take care of the problem for us. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM. We purchased two of these vacuums. One of them quit working a month after we purchased. Amazon refuses to replace because it is 2 days past the return date. Oreck wants us to drive 1 1/2 hours to the nearest service center to have it looked at. Completely unacceptable customer service from both Oreck and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: springville school

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE it. I vacuumed yesterday with my old vacuum and this new one came today and I vacuumed again and got so much dust and dirt out of the carpet! I did three rooms very slowly and thoroughly and probably filled about a quarter of the bag just with dust and dirt. I’m so glad I got it! My last vacuum was $400 and it never performed this well! I don’t care that it doesn’t turn or have adapters to do extra stuff. I just want good suction. This one does basic vacuuming at a phenomenal level. That’s all I want. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great. Lighter than my original Oreck Commercial
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great. Lighter than my original Oreck Commercial. Goes from carpet to tile to hardwood without changing anything..Great! Change bag every week after use so that I don't have pet odors coming from the bag. Nice long cord means less stop & move to a new outlet. Brush roller easy to maintain & economically changeable if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't bother to write reviews but I felt this was worthy of it. This is the BEST vacuum I have ever used. I have a dog that sheds a lot and I had to vacuum every other day. I wanted a week to vacuum while waiting on the Oreck Vacuum to see how well it performs and I'm blown away. It did a better job after a week of not vacuuming than the vacuum I was using almost daily!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased 2 Oreck 2100rhs for a cleaning business. We liked the color of the u2000r-1 and thought the extra cord length would help. The color, cord length, the price, and a handle in the back to help lift are the differences between the two. The cord is a hassle with the added conection behind the bag, and The lifter isnt nessasary. A very great unit, simply built, simple to maintain, but the 2100rhs is a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have carpet
customer_reviews.text: It should be clearly described that this vacuum is not for home use with carpeting. It seems "commercial" does not mean a more quality machine but rather it's only meant for use in office buildings that have very thin carpets. Even on a pretty thin oriental rug, it is very difficult to push. The overall build quality seems cheap. I would not recommend this other than for use in office buildings or on bare floors and tile.
customer_reviews.author: Funky1

customer_reviews.title: Good, but has some design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Needed a commercial vacuum that could handle daily use. Has great suction, but it is brand new right now. Weirdest thing is you cant roll it along cause the wheels arent placed right, you pretty much have to pick it up and carry it around unless you are actively vacuuming. No attatchments or pull out hose for corners/edges..
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: and could not be happier. I previously owned another brand that advertised amazing ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Oreck vacuum cleaners for years as I have professionally housecleaned for almost 30 years. I just purchased this one, vacuumed my whole house, carpet and tile floors, and could not be happier. I previously owned another brand that advertised amazing suction and bag less and after 4 years returned it and got my money back ($500+). This Oreck is superior to any product on the market and I have used many. I prefer to use my Oreck in my clients' homes for ease and efficiency. There are no tools with this vacuum but Oreck does sell their little canister which is very handy and works great. I strongly recommend Oreck vacuums for efficiency and simplistic cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesgang53

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum destroys
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum will defy gravity and suck a golf ball through a garden hose. It will clean every of the dust from your carpets and leave you with carpets clean enough to eat off of. Realistically, it's a great vacuum; I dont have a long usage history of this vacuum but for my studio, I feel like one of those doomsday preppers: completely overprepared for a mess that won't actually happen, RIP. This vacuum cleaner is my buy-once-for-life-or-at-least-20-years appliance because I hate buying consumer goods for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AN "OK" VACUUM.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does a fairly good job . I do find it difficult to maneuver. So far I have not seen any better results than I have had with my previous vacuum. The cord presents a problem when I have to store the vacuum. It cannot be wrapped around the vacuum. I guess I expected that I would be able to do that.
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: magical new vacuumm
customer_reviews.text: these vacuums are magical. we have three black dogs ranging in size from 150 pounds to 55 pounds and my husband and i each have waist length hair. our old one lasted for 16 years and finally gave up its ghost. they are light weight, compact, and the only thing that really goes wrong are the belts can where out. i will purchase another one when this one goes bad as well. Oreck is the brand that most professional cleaning people use.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product; performs well.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Oreck vacuum. We like it as a quick clean up when we choose not to haul out the central vac hose. Our daughter inherited our first vacuum and it works well for her.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it died 6 months later
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Worked like a champ then just rolled over and died. I used it approximately 3 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Burning smell and/or constantly replacing the belt
customer_reviews.text: Every few weeks the vacuum cleaner starts making a burning smell. The manufacturer will not exchange the unit because belt maintenance is normal, but we have to replace it every few weeks which is definitely not normal. If we take it to a dealer, we are charged (almost the same price as the vacuum) because it is not covered due to it being "regular maintenance."
customer_reviews.author: PrimeLover

customer_reviews.title: and this is the ONLY vacuum I can use comfortably. I have 3 dogs and this vacuum is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had an Oreck vacuum for the past 20 years - no other vacuum compares to this. I have a long torso - very tall, and this is the ONLY vacuum I can use comfortably. I have 3 dogs and this vacuum is the best - one sweep and all dog hair is gone, no going back and forth over and over. Very light weight maneuvers with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Eqwks

customer_reviews.title: Not good for home use.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is not good on typical carpets found in family homes. It's more suited to the low pile carpets found in commerical buildings
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was bought for our Church.
customer_reviews.text: It has been great! We love how light weight it is. We already had one that has moved with us from state to state in our Church work. Our old one still works great. The Church one has the extra long cord. We are so thankful! We also bought my sister one as she is the one that cares for our Dad. Love ORECK!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rose

customer_reviews.title: It munches the carpet!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of carpet in my new space and it matches the curtains. The Oreck is nice and light and does a fine job of picking up flotsam and jetsam. My dog is at my ex-wife’s house so I don’t know about pet hair. Its has a super long cord and it’s red what more could a new divorced guy ask for in a vacuum?
customer_reviews.author: Googs

customer_reviews.title: Omg this thing sucks!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice when things that are supposed to suck in life actually come through!! This thing could suck the chrome off a trailer hitch an I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Wagner

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: After going through several brand-named HEPA, bagless vacuum cleaners which all performed horribly, I decided to go “old-school” and bought this vacuum. It is awesome! My house has carpet, ceramic and wood flooring and this thing cleans like a charm. Very lightweight, easy to assemble and my carpeting looks like new! This thing SUCKS......in a good way!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: For ease of use you can't beat an Oreck. ...
customer_reviews.text: For ease of use you can't beat an Oreck. Very lightweight, it moves seamlessly from floors to carpets and back again. Very powerful suction. The extra-long cord is a real bonus, too. It does have pegs on the machine to wrap up the cord, and the extra handle is handy. Firmly planted in middle age, I've got an elbow, back and sometimes a knee that can't handle heavy machines anymore. And I find I don't want all those attachments other machines have. Because it is so lighweight, you can use the whole Oreck just as readily. Tried another so-called "recommended/best-rated" company's model for a short while, then back to my Oreck.They last forever, too.
customer_reviews.author: amiralooli

customer_reviews.title: This unit is perfect for that
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a durable, light weight vacuum cleaner without all the bells and whistle attachments. This unit is perfect for that. The cord is somewhat bulky (maybe they could downsize the commercial overkill) and heavy and it is loud. The auto height adjusts well going from bare floors to thick carpeting. Bag is easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, strong, effective vacuum with many good features (such as long cord). However, as I used it -- it smelled funky, then offensive. Sort of a mixture of dust, air freshener, smoke and lint. Awful. Thankfully, Amazon backed me up and sent out a new one, asking that I return this vacuum. I did, and now I am enjoying my purchase as one of the most powerful vacuums I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Oreck XL commercial 5  stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Orick XL professional vacuum cleaner from Amazon, very fast shipping, and the box was in excellent condition, thanks guys, i've been a Bachelor my whole life, I've rarely used a vacuum cleaner, however my mother recently was diagnosed with Alzheimer's, and her old vacuum cleaner wasn't able to keep up with the job, A good friend of mine who lives in Hawaii, and runs a small hotel told me about this machine and said there's nothing better on the market, I agree 5 stars 10 if I could give it thanks Mr.Oreck. R Frost
customer_reviews.author: R Frost.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love the extra long cord. I can do the whole upstairs without having to change outlets. Good suction too.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice light-weight vacuum without all the gimmicks you don't need ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice light-weight vacuum without all the gimmicks you don't need to just vacuum. It does a great job filling in for our Roomba and even up to cleaning up light construction debris and new carpet fuzz.
customer_reviews.author: BSM

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Loud
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum while it picks up well, is too loud. I really think this could be a little quieter as all vacuums are loud this wins the blue ribbon.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after about a year.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine until it didn't. Got a bit more than a year -- and did not use it that often. Not sure if others had this issue, but we will not buy anything from Oreck again.
customer_reviews.author: K. C. Hanner

customer_reviews.title: Liked it for a while now the grey bag and ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked it for a while now the grey bag and the filtered bag are blowing off when vacuuming. I am finding the clip at the bottom of the inside of the grey bag. It keeps happening I bought another clip will see how it works. Buy the vacuum that you slide the filter in place then attach it. It is inside the bag. The clip appears to be defective and appears to be the wrong shape.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P.

customer_reviews.title: I WILL buy another one
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is cheap made. The frame that hold the motor is plastic and will break. This suppose to be a commercial grade. The warranty is only for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Brown

customer_reviews.title: Strong clean vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, strong and very lightweight vacuum, cleans rugs and hard flooring very well, the only thing I would like is if the brushes were closer to one edge it the other. But still beats the box store vacuums with no nasty dirt cups, or filters to clean, releasing the dirt back in the home and in your face,
customer_reviews.author: Chris Warner

customer_reviews.title: I love the long iong cord on it
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and lightweight makes for a winning combo.I love the long iong cord on it! I have other Orecks and have noticed this one appears to be more cheaply made.This model doesn't have the light in front to see in closets and has no bells and whistles. If you're wanting a straight forward vacuum that delivers on suction I reccommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA COOK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Upright Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple vacuum that works as advertised. I like the long cord that enables me to vacuum all the rooms in one floor of the house from a single outlet. The fact that the cord disconnects from the handle when pulled too hard means that I do not have to walk back to the outlet to get going again. I prefer a vacuum with a bag so I don't waste time cleaning multiple filters. It is very light in weight for an upright vacuum which means I am able to move fast without strain. This is an excellent vacuum for wood floors and low pile carpet.
customer_reviews.author: mh

customer_reviews.title: but annoying to others
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, who constantly borrows mine. It was an incredible offer as I gave in to opening an Amazon Credit card at the same time. The already-on-sale price, coupled with the discount for opening the credit card made my purchase only $75! I did notice the word "commercial" in the description but really didn't search out what that mean. To my daughter's thrill, it has a chord that is long enough to enable her to clean her whole apartment without having to plug and unplug. Small thing to some, but annoying to others.
customer_reviews.author: M Pyatt

customer_reviews.title: This should be 4.5 stars. Excellent no frills vacuum with great suction!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great suction Big collection bag Easy to maneuver between chairs and under tables Cut vacuum time at least in half! Seems heavy duty Cons: Though it is light to pick up its a bit harder push than my old Kenmore Canister vacuum No attachments, though this doesn't count against my rating as it is a commercial vacuum and is advertised as such Summary: This vacuum works as advertised. It picks up dirt in half the time of my old vacuum and is easier to maneuver. Don't expect anything fancy as it isn't a "home" model but it gets the job. Done. Would definitely purchase again assuming it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't as happy with this Oreck as I was with my earlier ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't as happy with this Oreck as I was with my earlier Oreck, although I bought that before the company changed hands. For the price, it is fine. It is light weight so carrying it up and down stairs is easier. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: dalyn cavanaugh ortega

customer_reviews.title: Don't spend the money - You'll just be buying another in 2 yrs...  So sad!
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this vacuum cleaner for 2-1/2 years ... And I guess that's okay - but for the money? I won't be buying another .. And that makes me sad ... I've always loved the quality of Oreck .. This unit has never really come up to expectations ... and now .. I'm better off just grabbing a broom...
customer_reviews.author: L Massie

customer_reviews.title: It was a favorite vacuum among employees but it's only 1 1/2 years ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a favorite vacuum among employees but it's only 1 1/2 years old and the entire handle broke, can't be fixed by me. Looks like maybe it could be welded but what's the chance that it would work. Will contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: Preschool

customer_reviews.title: Oreck XL commercial
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a "no frills" vacuum... however, it sucks up dirt, sand and dog hairs like no other upright (or canister) I've ever had before. If you're looking for bells & whistles, this is not your vacuum...but if you're looking for one that will truly clean carpets and hard floors, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: RMY

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing. I have 4 dogs. Two of which have long hair. This vacuum has not lost suction and has not gotten clogged. The vacuum transitions from carpet to hardwood seamlessly and the bag last forever. Did I mention that it’s super light? It’s easy to carry and move around.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henry

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Company Captivated
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, works great. Wish I could buy more for my cleaning company.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner leaves my carpets very clean and has a very fresh smell after cleaning. The only problem I had was that some of the bottles leaked. I don't know why because they were wrapped in bubble wrap. It was not very much but they did leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it breaks all the time
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for 5 months and the belt has broken 3 times, the vacuum has been taken to be repaired twice and it just started smoking when we started to use it today. I guess its too late to return and I'm not sinking another $150 into fixing it so unfortunately will be thrown nit I the trash and looking for a new one. I would not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: jdb500

customer_reviews.title: Oreck is very dependable vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The seller is very dependable. We purchased a Oreck vacuum back in Oct and by Dec it has quit working. I contacted seller and they shipped out a new one to us immediately. This is only time we have had problem with the appliance and have purchased 15 or more! Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Way Too LOUD and Handle Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is still in good workable shape, but I had to buy a new one just because it is WAY too LOUD. It should come with a free set of earplugs. The vibration of the machines causes the screws in the handle to loosen and fall out. I was bringing this to the office one day and my wife told me to keep a phillips head screwdriver handy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Scampoli

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfull vacuum cleaner. I can vacuum most of my townhome with that ultra long cord! I have a three level townhouse, and needed something light weight. No problem getting the Oreck up and down the stairs. Great suction! I had an Oreck vacuum cleaner in the past and hated it. So, this purchased with a great deal of skepticism. Oreck redeemed themselves with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Ecmxcellent commercial grade vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: We've tried numerous vacuums over the years. Pet hair always kills all that we've tried. But this Oreck Commercial shows no problems in dealing with not only general vacuuming, but pet hair doesn't stand a chance. This Commercial grade vacuum is also incredibly lightweight and very easy to store away, plus the super long power cord allows you to go from room to room without stopping to locate another outlet. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase. Very highly recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Davis

customer_reviews.title: The unit isn't as robust as we expected for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit isn't as robust as we expected for a "Commercial" unit. After only 6 months of use (daily vacuuming of approx. 1000 sq ft. the vacuum handle broke and the tube connector stripped. We have contacted Oreck regarding getting the unit repaired but the closest repair outlet is 150+ miles away and shipping it away isn't an option. I have managed to get it back into working order with a few hose clamps and duck tape, but really expected more from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mac

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent vacuum for floors
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent vacuum for floors. I took off a star because I can't get the the edge where the carpet meets the wall. Otherwise, I love everything about this lightweight, powerful, effective vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: VERY LIGHTWEIGHT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best vacuum I have used and I have used many. Love the long cord, not having to adjust for different flooring and that it has a huge bag that lasts forever. The bagless smell, I hate looking at the dirt and having to deal with the dirt that is still in the tank after disposal. Vacuum suction and brush are incredible. Wish there were attachments. Slides right under bed - Love this vacuum!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great value, light weight to save on your lower back.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these for our commercial cleaning service for the past 20 years. They save on the lower back because of the light weight of the vacuum. They do a wonderful job. easy to maneuver. Replace the inner bags frequently and the machine won't get too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The big brother of the little portable Oreck Hurricane. ...
customer_reviews.text: The big brother of the little portable Oreck Hurricane. If the portable Oreck is more powerful than an elephant's trunk, this thing is more powerful than a heard of elephants. I've had a three Dysons as well as a Shark. This simple, retro looking vacuum has them all beat.
customer_reviews.author: AZ21412

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum, amazing suction. No frills industrial strength. No attachments but I knew that when I bought it. I have a little canister vac to do base boards, corners and such. The Oreck is nice and light, moves easily across carpet or bare floor. I love that you don't have to stop and adjust something when going from one surface to another, it does it automatically. I would highly recommend this Oreck, great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mordecai

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: Needed a light weight vacuum with a long cord to clean the floor and carpet in our small church. Does a decent job but doesn’t do edges well. Disappointed in the quality because the red paint wore off after the first few uses and screws came loose. I’d probably order a canister model with attachments next time.
customer_reviews.author: ronisab

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off while running
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a couple months. Now, it automatically shuts off after running for about 30 seconds. I missed the month window to return the vaccum. I called Oreck to take to an authorize dealer or repair shop, and they told me that I need an RMA number. I called Oreck back and they said that I don't need an RMA number. They said if that repair shop doesn't want to repair it that they will give me an address for another dealer. The other dealer is an hour away.
customer_reviews.author: KVB

customer_reviews.title: Careful with this Vacumn
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has leaked grease on my light carpeting. I have not done anything mechanical to it and have owned around a year...it also wants to veer right or left. Just not saftisfied...particulary, as I do not find it to be inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Procton

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great - Still Love it after the first month !
customer_reviews.text: The Power Cord! I can plug it in to the dining room wall plug and reach every room in our 3 bedroom, 2500 sq home! Cleans Under the beds easy. The Filters let nothing out but the Air! We Love it! 244 Jake
customer_reviews.author: Big Jake

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: While I do like the Oreck and this one replaces an older one, I have to say it is much louder than the one I purchased in 2006. In fact I would not have purchased this had I known. It has a screaming whistle that my old one did not have and I actually use ear plugs now.
customer_reviews.author: palcafe

customer_reviews.title: We buy some at Goodwill change belt and sometimes brush and put em to work.
customer_reviews.text: If you are not using Oreck 8 pound vacs you are working too hard!
customer_reviews.author: T. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum. I bought this for our church social ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum. I bought this for our church social hall because we do a lot of lunches and dinners. It is light and easily run and does a great job. Every ones likes to use it . We don't like it when the men ask to use it .
customer_reviews.author: pbrennen

customer_reviews.title: If its good enough for an entire floor of rooms
customer_reviews.text: Hotels use these or a variation of it. If its good enough for an entire floor of rooms, it can certainly handle your home. Everything about it is no frills, no bull-sh.. it just does its job properly. Only drawback I can see someone having about this product is that it doesnt have a hose. Personally though, I prefer items that perform one job exceptionally, than a bunch of jobs mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: These last for years
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Oreck. My old one finally just wore out and my husband said instead of him trying to put on a new cord just buy a new one. I had it so long and used it so much the bottom brushes and wheels were wearing out. Not a lick of trouble with this machine over the years and the motor still worked well. The new one doesn't have the light the old one did and also it's way more noisy, in fact I wear ear protection using it! It's still I great machine and does a wonderful job.
customer_reviews.author: NJY

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't think it does the deep cleaning job my Hoover Windtunnel does, but for quick and easy clean-ups, and for someone with a bad back, it works well. It's lighter and easier to push, since it doesn't have quite the suction. The HEPA bags, though a definite added expense (I'm used to bagless), work well. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Cannata

customer_reviews.title: ... vacation mountain house and it gets a lot of good comments from guests cleaning up when it's time to ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this at a vacation mountain house and it gets a lot of good comments from guests cleaning up when it's time to leave. It's not as wide as I'm used to but that doesn't slow down the job. No settings or accessories which keep it simple, but limited. The cord must be about 500 feet long. It's only shortcoming is on some area rugs you must know the nap and only vacuum one direction. Otherwise very easy to use and should last forever.
customer_reviews.author: M. Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Another fantastic Oreck product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Oreck upright. I am very impressed with the quality. It has great suction and picks up pet hair easily. We have wood floors and it moves easily. It is light weight and easy to carry from room to room. Having the long cord is nice so you don't have to keep changing plugs to move through the house. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and light.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Oreck we've ever had. My husband uses it for commercial work and I love it in the house. It has great power and is so light. It also has a low profile so it goes under beds (not all the way under but much better than most uprights).
customer_reviews.author: Lorna M. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, great price
customer_reviews.text: The extra-long handle fits my extra-tall husband well. (I'm quite short, and find it a little too long for easy use). The vacuum fits under most furniture well - it lays quite flat when sweeping under chairs and cabinets. We use it in a workshop/study; the very long cord allows us to sweep the entire shop without trotting around to unplug and re-plug. Suction is excellent and the price great.
customer_reviews.author: ruraltraveler

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum is not working well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use the vacuum for 2 weeks and have been having lots of troubles with this vacuum. This is very unfortunate because the other one I bought works great.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: TOO DAMN NOISY
customer_reviews.text: Too noisy, hard to push on carpet. Maybe on commercial carpet it's fine. Huge mistake on my part. Had to order another model.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca E. Eigen

customer_reviews.title: I'm totally satisfied with my Oreck
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally satisfied with my Oreck. I've owned one before, with a couple of other brands in between... no contest so far as I'm concerned. The light weight alone is enough reason to choose Oreck but I wanted a vacuum that basically did only what I wanted (clean the floors!) and didn't include a dozen other features I would never use. Perfect for my purposes, and the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Mary H Kirkendall

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, It is amazing for a small house or buisness...Made in America too!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum, It is as powerful as my previous (POS) Dyson... It fits under the table and the bed. It is a commercial model, but feels much the same as the retail model. I know I saved a ton through Amazon too. Buy it, I have tile and it cleans it amazingly well...
customer_reviews.author: PSL 54C

customer_reviews.title: Oreck's the best.
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd Oreck and I love it. The cord reaches from one end of my condo to the other. And, it lies flat to get under the bed. Love it. It arrived on time and was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Luce

customer_reviews.title: She's delighted and I'm happy that this one works as well ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the weight, the self adjustment height when changing from carpet to tile floors. She's delighted and I'm happy that this one works as well as the first one we bought. One for the lake house and now one at home. Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred R. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through dog hair fairly well
customer_reviews.text: Good pet vacuum. It clogged and needed to me cleaned after about 7 months of Great Pyrenees and 2 short haired dogs' hair.
customer_reviews.author: Denvernurse

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy with Oreck or the warranty service
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum is louder then average. Bearings went out in motor after only 8 months. Have to wait a 7 - 10 days for them to mail you a return label. Not to happy with Oreck or the warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: Cigar Guy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Vac
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Oreck- The other one died after about 12 years! My wife loves it because of the light weight. (Our cat hates it)
customer_reviews.author: Alfy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to vacuum the Martial arts school that my Son & I attend. It works great & this place is huge so the 40' cord is great!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love this! This is an incredibly light weight vac that is a breeze to use. Having arthritis makes regular housework difficult at times but this causes no strain at all on any of my joints. This is the best vac I've ever owned. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product...
customer_reviews.text: OUTSTANDING product, lightweight and easily assembled. This is the second Oreck which I've owned; Ex-wife has the first one, however this one is better. I recommend anyone to purchase an Oreck.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F. Cunningham

product_meta.title: Oreck Commercial Upright Bagged Vacuum Cleaner, Lightweight, 40ft Power Cord, U2000R1, Grey/Red
product_meta.description: Oreck Commercial U2000R-1 Upright Vacuum Cleaner. Caution-improper connection of the equipment grounding conductor can result in a risk of electrical shock. Check with a qualified electrician or service person if you are in doubt as to whether the outlet is grounded. If not have a proper outlet installed by a qualified electrician. This appliance is for use on a nominal 120 volt circuit. It has a grounding plug similar to the example shown. Make sure the appliance is connected to an outlet with the same configurations the plug. No adapter should be used with this appliance. Headlights - None
feature_bullets: LIGHTWEIGHT: Weighing only 8 pounds and covering a 12" wide area this vacuum makes cleaning easy & quick.
EXTRA LONG CORD: With a 40 foot power cord is connected with a cord clamp allowing you to easily replace a damaged cord without expensive repairs.
HELPING HAND HANDLE: The convenient on/off switch on the handle has received Ease-Of-Use Commendation from the Arthritis Foundation.
MICROSWEEP FEATURE: Vacuum easily moves between carpet and hard floors without having to manually change any settings.
TOP FILL BAG: Get more use out and suction power out of the 630 cubic inch bag.
LOCKS IN DIRT: Saniseal technology automatically seals in allergens, dirt, and debris upon disposal, reducing the "dust puff" created by other vacuums.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
